00015 template<class function_type>
00016         class CustomFunctionBase {
00017     public:
00018         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00019         QString symbolic ();
00020         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00021 
00022     protected:
00023         bool loadFunction (const QString &);
00024         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00025         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00026 
00027         function_type *func;
00028         void *handle;
00029         bool valid;
00030 };
00031 
00032 class CustomFunction:
00033         public Function,
00034         public CustomFunctionBase<Function::raw_function_type> {
00035     public:
00036         CustomFunction (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00037                         double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00038                         double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00039                         bool final = true);
00040         virtual ~CustomFunction();
00041 
00042     protected:
00043         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double);
00044 };

00084 #include <dlfcn.h>
00085 
00089 template<class function_type>
00090         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName) {
00091     static char *error;
00092 
00093     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00094     if (!handle) {
00095         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00096         return false;
00097     }
00098 
00099     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00100     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00101         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00102         return false;
00103     }
00104 
00105     return true;
00106 }
00107 
00110 template<class function_type>
00111         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00112     typedef char* STRING;
00113     STRING (*sym)();
00114     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00115     char *error;
00116     static char *ret;
00117 
00118     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00119         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00120         return QString ("something");
00121     }
00122     ret=(*sym)();
00123     return QString (ret);
00124 }
